sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of meng yan 夢魘 , nightmare, and jing 痙 , spasms. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 quoting Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 : 殺鬼精物，温瘧蠱毒癇痙，去 三蟲，除邪，令人無夢魘 , “It kills demonic and spiritual beings, warmth malaria, gu poison, epileptic and other spasms, eliminates the three types of bugs/ worms, removes evil, and makes a person have no nightmares”, abbreviates this lengthy indication and simply writes: 驚痙邪氣 , “ Fright with spasms and evil qi”.
